site.title: William He | Software Engineer
site.description: William He is a software engineer based in Vancouver, Canada. He specializes in full-stack web development and has experience with a variety of technologies.

name.title: NAME
name.content: williamhe - software developer with a knack for web development

content.description: William He is a {{age}}-year-old full-stack web developer based in Vancouver, BC with a burning passion for web design and development. He is a graduate of British Columbia Institute of Technology, where he completed his Computer Systems Technology (Web and Mobile Development Option) diploma and is pursuing a Bachelor of Science degree in Applied Computer Science (Wireless and Mobile Applications Option).
content.hint: Enter or click on one of the commands under "SYNOPSIS" to learn more about William He.
